text:
Roger Haroldo Rodas Melgar (May 29, 1946 – June 15, 2020) was a Guatemalan economist and politician. He was Minister of Foreign Affairs in the cabinet of President Álvaro Colom, from January 14, 2008 to January 14, 2012. He was the only minister that was in office for the four-year term. He was born in Guatemala City.
Rodas died of COVID-19 on June 15, 2020 in Guatemala City, aged 74.
